result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marlandez Delates McDaniel

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Certification of transcript of proceedings of INITIAL APPEARANCE commencing OCTOBER 22, 2015 received and filed. (10 Pages.)
Copy of transcript forwarded to MICHAEL HOLZMAN 400 W MORELAND BLVD WAUKESHA WI 53188.
Copy of entire court file forwarded to Michael Holzman, Attorney at Law.

Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in custody.  Benjamin Andrew Wesson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Pursuant to plea negotiations, and on motion of the State, Court ordered case DISMISSED to be used as a READ-IN on case 15CF4587.  Court ordered the $500.00 cash bail on deposit be transferred to case 15CF4587.  Calendar call scheduled for April 19, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Leah R. Thomas in court, defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel not in court, in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Attorney Leah Thomas informs the court that Judge Cimpl has agreed to take this case. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 19.  Plea hearing scheduled for April 14, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Leah R. Thomas in court, defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel not in court, in custody.  Thomas L. Potter appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status hearing. Defendant has another felony case (15CF4587) before Branch 19 (CIMPL). Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 21.  Status conference scheduled for April 11, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

State and Defense stipulate to taking this case of the trial calendar and setting it for a Status Conference after the Plea and Sentencing hearing on his felony case (15CF4587) before Branch 19 (CIMPL). Jury Trial set for 03-21-2016 is VACATED.   COURT WILL RETAIN FILE.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT PRODUCED FROM THE CRIMINAL JUSTICE FACILITY FOR PURPOSES OF A JURY TRIAL IN BRANCH 4.

Attorney Leah R. Thomas in court, Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel not in court, in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant not produced from the Criminal Justice Facility for purposes of this hearing. Defendant's Jury Trial date has been rescheduled due to Branch 19 setting their felony case for a Jury Trial on the same date as this case was going to trial.  Court will VACATE Jury Trial set for 03-07-2015.  Jury trial scheduled for March 21, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Received and filed with court.

Attorney Leah R. Thomas in court, defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel not in court, in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Case set for Jury Trial. Parties request adjourned Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Court grants defense request. Case adjourned to branch 45.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 8, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for March 7, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Defendant's Motion in Limine received and filed with court.
Received and filed with court.
Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions received and filed with court.

Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Final pretrial held. Case remains scheduled for jury trial on 10-21-2015 at 8:30 am in Branch 45.

Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date.  Parties are notified that effective August 3, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Judge Lindsey Grady, Branch 23 in Courthouse room 515.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for October 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in court with attorney Leah R. Thomas.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State has turned over an offer and discovery.  Defense needs time to review with defendant and requests another status date. Court orders case adjourned to Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
  Attorney Dluzak informs court that there has been a breakdown in communication that is irreconcilable.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Attorney is to inform the Public Defender's Office that new counsel needs to be appointed.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for June 11, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Bail motion by defendant argued and granted by the Court.  Court releases defendant from Justice Point monitoring. All other conditions of bail to remain the same.

Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State has turned over an offer and discovery.  Defense requests another pretrial conference date. Cout orders case adjourned to Branch 46.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.

15RM020059  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
04/15/2015

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.
Court ordered defendant to be monitored by Drug Testing
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Defendant Marlandez Delates McDaniel in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Current: 9220 N 75th Street  #220, Milwaukee, WI 53223   (Effective: 04-14-2015)
Prior: 6201 West Thurston Avenue, Milwaukee, WI 53218
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
